mehidi pirith wikashaya kerena wehera wihara athara kolambaa - bodhiraja wiharaya, gampaha - madagama siri sunandaramaya, kaluthara bodhin wahanse, mathara bodhin wahanse saha anuradhapura - bauddhayathana wiharayada wanawa.esema kurunagala - athkanda rajamaha wiharaya, nuwaraeliya - bauddha madhyasthanaya, katharagama - kiriwehera, polonnaruwa - bodhimalu wiharaya saha rathnapura - shri gnyanasiha thapowana wiharaya hiruge me maha pinkatayuththata sambandhayi.ada raya pahanwanathuru rediyowak thibena sama niwasakama ratata saha obata sethpatha sidukerena mema pirith sachchayanaya wikashaya kerena bawa hiruge eekayana wishwasayayi.
